mapper.select: select o.banner, o.orderDate, o.hp, o.postalcode, o.deliveryAddress, p.name, p.thumbnailImageUrl, p.brand, u.nickname, u.profileImage, o.banner, o.orderDate from jogong.order as o left join user as u on o.friendNum=u.num left join product as p on o.productNum = p.num where friendNum=#{num};

select o.banner, o.orderDate, p.name, p.thumbnailImageUrl, p.brand, u.nickname, u.profileImage, from jogong.order as o left join user as u on o.userNum=u.num left join product as p on o.productNum = p.num where userNum=#{num};
